description.narrative: 1. By 2018, strengthened government capacity for policy development, planning and financing of quality education., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Evaluation And Research, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2. By 2018, boys and girls in Cambodia have more equitable access to and completion of quality inclusive education with improved learning outcomes.

mailing-address.narrative: No.11 Street 75 Sangkat Sraschark P.O. Box 176 Phnom Penh

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1. By 2018, strengthened government capacity for policy development, planning and financing of quality education.

description.narrative: UNICEF continues as the fund administrator for the third phase of the Capacity Development Partnership Fund (CDPF), a four-year programme (2018-2021) with an estimated $27 million budget. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of provincial Annual Operational Plans which are of good quality and include equity-oriented interventions
Amount of government programme-based budget allocated for scholarships in the education budget
